ingredients.@value: 1/2 cup lightly packed fresh lemon verbena leaves (about 10 to 15 leaves; you can substitute lemon balm)
1/2 cup lightly packed fresh mint leaves (woody stems removed; about 20 leaves)

recipeInstructions.@value: Bring a pot of fresh water almost, but not quite, to a boil. Put mint and verbena leaves in a teapot. Pour 2 cups of the water over leaves. Let steep for 3 to 5 minutes, then strain into teacups.
